snippet.title: Demon Spore - Official Gameplay Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description: Watch the terrifying trailer for Demon Spore to see gameplay and horrific creature from this action rogue-lite game inspired by 80s monster movies. In Demon Spore, blast your way out of tentacle hell as a failed lab experiment gives birth to a rapidly growing viral horror. Use the lab to your advantage and improvise an escape plan before this constantly evolving life form spreads out of control.
